Articles.Content:
"I cannot see where the villagers are coming from"

                                    - bill the [ion powered](http://news.mit.edu/2018/first-ionic-wind-plane-no-moving-parts-1121) reconnaissance drone 

If you even touch bill I swear.

Spoiler

I send a radio message to your village

> 
> 
> Quote
> 
> 
> do not touch the plane
>

**Edited <time datetime="2020-04-05T01:36:17Z" title="04/05/2020 01:36  AM" data-short="4 yr">April 5, 2020</time> by Dirkidirk**

> 
> 
> 43 minutes ago, Dirkidirk said:
> 
> 
> I send a radio message to your village
> 

Problem: The only person in Crumble Crater Village with a radio is Bob, and no one understands him since he speaks in bash script.  So I build Bill a mud hut out of dust piles of his smaller, dead cousins.  Bob and Bill quickly become friends.

I didn't touch Bill while building the hut, so we're good.

**Edited <time datetime="2020-04-05T02:16:52Z" title="04/05/2020 02:16  AM" data-short="4 yr">April 5, 2020</time> by RoninFrog**

> 
> 
> 54 minutes ago, RoninFrog said:
> 
> 
> I build Bill a mud hut out of dust piles of his smaller, dead cousins.
> 

I am assuming that he:

![A new airplane uses charged molecules to fly | Science News](https://www.sciencenews.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/112018_lh_airplane_feat.jpg)

(essentially what bill looks like, but more advanced.)

enters the hut by just crashing in there, then bob gives him a push and he's off.

Spoiler

"bill, what are you doing in there? you're supposed to be spying on them, not making friends with them" ![:rolleyes:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_rolleyes.gif ":rolleyes:")

Spoiler

> 
> 
> 1 hour ago, RoninFrog said:
> 
> 
> I didn't touch Bill while building the hut, so we're good.
> 

yes we are, *for now.* \*menacing music\*

the no touching bill part was just a speech of figure or something like that, touching him is fine

![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif ":P")
crumble crater begins crumbling
Now it's Kerbal Krumble Krater on Kerbin.

And Bill is stranded1

Sen hal
Nani? My hill now.
our army of nanobots and Bob quickly destroy you. KRUMBLE KRATER RETAKEN

I launched a N1 rocket with a EMP missile from Baikonur Cosmodrome, all your nanobots are eutanized and dead.

now this hill belongs to me.

MWAHAHAHAHAHA AHHAHAHAH MWAHAHAHAHAHAHAH.
This hill - possibly. But the thread hill - no.

Destroyed with the obscure-remark-destroyer-inator.

Now time to set up the Duna Maniac's Cobalt Republic of the hill!

Spoiler

Eh?

**Edited <time datetime="2020-10-05T19:41:23Z" title="10/05/2020 07:41  PM" data-short="3 yr">October 5, 2020</time> by DunaManiac**
The cobolds of the Cobold Republic drive Maniac to Duna.

I Make a hill in space

My space hill

I launched a Titan V rocket with a Tsar Bomba as it's payload,so i can destroy your hill.

I made my own Hill made out of the debris.

I use [@Kane Kerman](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/206145-kane-kerman/)'s hill as a landing pad for my rocket.

It is my landing pad.
The bomb made a sphere. Hill Sphere.

Using Kittopia tech i reshaped your Hill Sphere into a Cube Planet.

and then i destroyed it to make my own hill of dirt.

MWAAHHHAHAAAH HAHAHAHAHA MWAHAHAHAHA

I use the hill of dirt to bury you, [@Kane Kerman](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/206145-kane-kerman/).

This is my new graveyard.

I used my laser to make my way to fresh vacuum, and then i destroyed your graveyard.

my Ural mountains aka Hills

I make a bomb-proof space hill

My bomb-proof space hill

![vlcsnap-2020-10-06-17h34m24s069.png](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/753371979461034124/763140950129901618/vlcsnap-2020-10-06-17h34m24s069.png)

I called godzilla for some help.

and then your hill became mine after some [Data Expunged]

my hill now
I make 10 million hills, each 10 million lightyears apart so people will (hopefully) stop fighting over hills. (Seriously they're just hills)

The people are here, 10 mln ly far from the closest hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2020-10-06T22:08:41Z" title="10/06/2020 10:08  PM" data-short="3 yr">October 6, 2020</time> by kerbiloid**

i somehow took [@kerbiloid](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/129408-kerbiloid/)'s hill.

and then i recovered my hill.it so i can get full control of it.

now that i've learned more powers:

![vlcsnap-2020-10-06-17h47m51s444.png](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/753371979461034124/763141050595672125/vlcsnap-2020-10-06-17h47m51s444.png)

**Edited <time datetime="2020-10-06T22:26:23Z" title="10/06/2020 10:26  PM" data-short="3 yr">October 6, 2020</time> by Kane Kerman**
I jump into the supermassive black hole in the centre of the galaxy because I can't live with people who fight over hills
